com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay

Interface NMapOverlayManager.CalloutOverlayViewInterface

  • Enclosing class:
    NMapOverlayManager

    public static interface NMapOverlayManager.CalloutOverlayViewInterface
    Callout overlay view should implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjustBounds(NMapView mapView, boolean animate, boolean adjustToCenter)
      Attempts to adjust location of this callout overlay within in the map view.
      boolean isCalloutViewInVisibleBounds(NMapView mapView)
      check if callout overlay is in the visible bounds of map view.
      void setOnClickListener(NMapCalloutOverlay.OnClickListener listener)
      Register a callback to be invoked when this callout is clicked
